sqlMap.statement: SELECT I.MDSE_CD ,I.INVTY_LOC_CD ,I.LOC_STS_CD ,I.STK_STS_CD ,I.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,I.EZTABLEID ,I.EZCANCELFLAG ,I.EZINTIME ,I.EZINTIMEZONE ,I.EZINCOMPANYCODE ,I.EZINUSERID ,I.EZINAPLID ,I.EZUPTIME ,I.EZUPTIMEZONE ,I.EZUPCOMPANYCODE ,I.EZUPUSERID ,I.EZUPAPLID ,I.LOC_TP_CD ,I.INVTY_QTY ,I.INVTY_ALLOC_QTY ,I.INVTY_AVAL_QTY FROM DS_RTL_WH_V DRWV ,INVTY I WHERE 1=1 AND DRWV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DRWV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DRWV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = I.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DRWV.RTL_WH_CATG_CD = #rtlWhCatgCd# AND DRWV.WH_OWNR_CD = #whOwnrCd# AND DRWV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DRWV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = I.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DRWV.INVTY_LOC_CD = I.INVTY_LOC_CD AND I.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND I.LOC_TP_CD = #locTpCd# AND I.LOC_STS_CD = #locStsCd# AND I.STK_STS_CD = #stkStsCd#
